parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The entity ID. Currently, only table entities are supported. You can call the ListTables operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: MetaCollectionId
parameters.description: The collection ID. You can refer to the return result of the ListMetaCollections operation.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: Remarks added when adding the entity to a collection. This parameter is currently valid only for album collections.
